titleStmt.title: A new plot, or The VVhig and Tory united being a dialogue between Titus Oats and Saxon the perjur'd evidence.
New plot.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for.[sic] D. Mallet, at the sign of the Black-Ball, near Bridewell-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: At end: "This may be printed, R.P. March the 9th. 1686.".
Copy annotated in MS. below title: "18. March. 1685/6".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.

place.placeName: the sign of the Black-Ball, near Bridewell-Bridge
